member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IFoundInstalledPackageHandler
member.summary: Implement this interface to add additional handling for each found installed package.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IFoundInstalledPackageHandler.ProcessInstalledPackage(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage)
member.summary: This will be called for each found installed package in the project.
member.param: The installedPackage created from found nuspec file.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageButtonsHandler
member.summary: Implement this interface to add additional buttons for each package in NugetForUnity window.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageButtonsHandler.DrawButtons(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage,NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method will be called for each package that is rendered in NugetForUnity window.
member.param: Package being renderer, either online package or installed package.
If package is installed this represents the installed version, otherwise it is null.
True if package installation should be disabled because it is already included in Unity.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageInstallFileHandler
member.summary: Implement this interface to add additional handling of files being extracted from nupkg during installation.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageInstallFileHandler.HandleFileExtraction(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage,System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry,System.String)
member.summary: This will be called for each entry that is about to be processed from nupkg that is being installed.
member.param: Package that is being installed.
Zip entry that is about to be processed.
The directory where the package is being installed.
member.returns: True if this method handled the entry and doesn't want default handling to be executed, false otherwise.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageUninstallHandler
member.summary: Implement this interface to add additional handling when nupkg is being uninstalled.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageUninstallHandler.HandleUninstall(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage,NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason)
member.summary: This method will be called for each package being uninstalled. Note that uninstall is also done for old version when package is being updated.
member.param: The package being uninstalled.
The reason uninstall is being called.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageUninstallHandler.HandleUninstalledAll
member.summary: This method will be called when all packages have been uninstalled using uninstall all method.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPlugin
member.summary: In order to register your plugin you need to implement this interface and then call methods on the provided registry object in order to provide additional functionalities for certain features.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPlugin.Register(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry)
member.summary: NugetForUnity will call this method automatically so you can tell it what custom functionalities your plugin is providing.
member.param: The registry where extension points can be registered to.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry
member.summary: NugetForUnity will pass an instance of this interface to INugetPlugin.Register method that plugins can use to register additional functionalities.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.IsRunningInUnity
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether we are currently running in Unity or from CLI.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.PluginService
member.summary: Gets the methods that NugetForUnity provides to the plugin, like logging methods.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.RegisterPackageButtonDrawer(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageButtonsHandler)
member.summary: Register a class that will be used to draw additional buttons for each package in NugetForUnity editor window.
member.param: The package buttons handler to register.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.RegisterPackageInstallFileHandler(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageInstallFileHandler)
member.summary: Register a class that will be called for each file that is extracted from the nupkg that is being installed.
member.param: The file handler to register.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.RegisterPackageUninstallHandler(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IPackageUninstallHandler)
member.summary: Register a class that will be called when uninstalling some package.
member.param: The package uninstall handler to register.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.INugetPluginRegistry.RegisterFoundInstalledPackageHandler(NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.ExtensionPoints.IFoundInstalledPackageHandler)
member.summary: Register a class that will be called when installed package is found.
member.param: The found installed package handler to register.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage
member.summary: Represents a NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage.Title
member.summary: Gets the title (not ID) of the package. This is the "friendly" name that only appears in GUIs and on web-pages.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage.ProjectUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL for the location of the package's source code.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackage.CurrentFrameworkDependencies
member.summary: Gets the list of dependencies for the framework that best matches what is available in Unity.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackageIdentifier
member.summary: Interface for a versioned NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackageIdentifier.Id
member.summary: Gets the Id of the package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackageIdentifier.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the normalized version number of the NuGet package. This is the normalized version number without build-metadata e.g. 1.0.0+b3a8 is normalized to 1.0.0.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPackageIdentifier.GetPackageInstallPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the folder path where this package is or will be installed.
member.param: In case you need to manipulate the folder to a bit different name you can provide the prefix you want to add to folder name here.
member.returns: Folder path where this package is or will be installed with an optional prefix to final path segment.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService
member.summary: Service methods that NugetForUnity provides to its plugins.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.ProjectAssetsDir
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the projects Assets directory.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.PackageInstallDir
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory where packages are installed.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.RegisterNuspecCustomizer(System.Action{NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile})
member.summary: Allows plugin to register a function that will modify the contents of default new nuspec file.
member.param: The function that will receive default nuspec file and modify it.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.CreateNuspecAndOpenEditor(System.String)
member.summary: Allows plugin to create a new nuspec file on the given location.
member.param: Either the absolute path within project to an existing directory or path relative to project's Asset folder.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs the given error message.
member.param: Message to log.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.LogErrorFormat(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted error message.
member.param: A composite format string.
Format arguments.

member.name: M:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INugetPluginService.LogVerbose(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted error message only if Verbose logging is enabled.
member.param: A composite format string.
Format arguments.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile
member.summary: Represents a .nuspec file used to store metadata for a NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.RepositoryBranch
member.summary: Gets or sets the source control branch the package is from.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.RepositoryCommit
member.summary: Gets or sets the source control commit the package is from.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.RepositoryType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of source control software that the package's source code resides in.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.RepositoryUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the url for the location of the package's source code.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Owners
member.summary: Gets or sets the owners of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.LicenseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the location of the license of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.ProjectUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the location of the project web-page of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.IconUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the location of the icon of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Icon
member.summary:
Gets the path to a icon file. The path is relative to the root folder of the package. This is a alternative to using a URL
.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.IconFilePath
member.summary: Gets the full path to a icon file. This is only set if the .nuspec file contains a . This is a alternative to using a URL .

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.RequireLicenseAcceptance
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the license of the NuGet package needs to be accepted in order to use it.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.ReleaseNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets the release notes of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Copyright
member.summary: Gets or sets the copyright of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the tags of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the NuGet package.

member.name: P:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.Models.INuspecFile.Authors
member.summary: Gets or sets the authors of the NuGet package.

member.name: T:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason
member.summary: Tells the uninstall method what kind of request from the user initiated it.

member.name: F:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason.IndividualUninstall
member.summary: User has requested individual packages to be uninstalled from the project.

member.name: F:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason.UninstallAll
member.summary: User has requested all packages to be uninstalled from the project.

member.name: F:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason.IndividualUpdate
member.summary: Use requested individual packages to be updated.

member.name: F:NugetForUnity.PluginAPI.PackageUninstallReason.UpdateAll
member.summary: Use requested all packages to be updated.
